titleStmt.title: The enchanted lovers: a pastoral / by Sr. William Lower Knight.
titleStmt.author: Lower, William, Sir, 1600?-1662.

notesStmt.note: With an engraved title. Cf. Greg.
A slip bearing three lines of text which were inadvertently omitted, is pasted at the bottom of D12v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
